p: COVID-19 has emerged as a global health problem of a large magnitude. Containment measures at population level are currently suggested as the best strategy to curtail the epidemic spurt of disease. As of today, no effective vaccine or a drug is available. However, a variety of evidence-based prevention and treatment modalities are expected to come out in the near future. In the period of crisis, media may play a role of public educator in order to calm down emotional responses associated with sense of helplessness due to acute surge of this pandemic. The global leaderships should join hands in devising effective management policies to combat this disease.
